thread.title: Internet Reacts to Tyga & Kodak Black's New Haircuts
thread.title_full: Internet Reacts to Tyga & Kodak Black's New Haircuts

author: NHHMS
title: Internet Reacts to Tyga & Kodak Black's New Haircuts
text:
http://www.billboard.com/files/styles/promo_225/public/media/Tyga-Pamela-Littky-2016-billboard-1548.jpg 
Over the weekend, Kodak Black and Tyga debuted their latest haircuts, which set off many reactions from Twitter critics. 
Black sliced off his signature “Kodak knots” in favor of a fade haircut with one knot in the back, perplexing social media users. “Kodak Black new hair cut looks like a piece of sh– is stuck in the back of his head,” wrote one tweeter. 
While many compared Black’s cut to the Boosie fade, the Florida rapper offered his own opinion. “This Ain’t A Boosie Fade F–k N—a This A #KodakFade #Trendsetter I Keep Something New Going On … I Cut The #KodakKnots,” he said. 
As for Tyga, his tiger-striped ‘do also earned Internet reviews. “The worst part about Tyga’s hair cut is the fact that there’s a barber out there that agreed to do that wack sh–,” offered another online critic. 
Check out both haircuts and social media reactions below: 
A photo posted by Tyga / T-Raww (@kinggoldchains) on Jan 29, 2017 at 9:56am PST Kodak black new hair cut looks like a piece of shit is stuck in the back of his head
